content.rendered: The Yamazaki Mizunara 2017 Edition is composed of whiskies aged for 18 years or longer in casks made from mizunara, or Japanese oak, an extremely rare tree, which imparts a dignified oriental flavour that confirms the immense value of these casks. This whisky is the pinnacle of mizunara-aged single malt whiskies.
